column4: Okey, i have asked it around 30 times, but here it goes again... I have an old laptop with an ATI 7500 mobilty radeon, and not supported by any driver i tried up till now (eg the ENVYNG thingy). This is what i get if i use ﻿glxinfo :name of display: :0.0 display: :0  screen: 0, and if i run GLX gears, I see my processor going from 10 to 100%, so its rendered by my processor, not by my vid. Anybody got an idea?
